uncertainties: Limited human clinical data specifically for the unmethylated benzamide variant
Potential for cumulative toxicity only at extreme concentrations not seen in environmental exposure
citations: Schoenig, G. P., et al. (1993). Evaluation of the subchronic toxicity of diethyltoluamide (DEET).
Usmani, K. A., et al. (2002). Metabolism of DEET by human liver microsomes and cytochrome P450 isoforms.
